triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The paper is a comprehensive review of UAVs and their characteristics, applications, and challenges.

triples.name: Wireless
triples.relevance: The paper discusses wireless communication as one of the key applications of UAVs.

triples.name: Swarm robotics
triples.relevance: The paper examines UAV swarms as a critical topic in the review of unmanned aerial systems.

triples.name: Surveillance
triples.relevance: Aerial surveillance is explicitly mentioned as a major application domain for UAV technology.
